# uiDelegate

**Instance Property**

The object you use to integrate custom user interface elements, such as contextual menus or panels, into web view interactions.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var uiDelegate: (any WKUIDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Displaying native user interface elements

- **WKUIDelegate**: The methods for presenting native user interface elements on behalf of a webpage.
